title: chestcommands的一些问题
author: 远远困了
txt_content: 如何用一个指令打开某菜单,而不是用cc open xxx

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-863834-1-1.html

或者 

spawn:
  ID: BEACON
  NAME: '&6回城'
  LORE: 
    - '点击回到主城'
  COMMAND: 'spawn'
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 1
复制代码
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-833109-1-1.html
